articles.author: Helen Regan and Cape Diamond, CNN Business
articles.title: American journalist Danny Fenster sentenced to 11 years in prison in Myanmar - CNN
articles.description: A military court has sentenced American journalist Danny Fenster to 11 years in prison, his lawyer said on Friday.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: American journalist Danny Fenster jailed for 11 years in Myanmar - ABC News
articles.description: A court in military-ruled Myanmar sentences US journalist Danny Fenster to 11 years in jail, as he still faces several more serious charges including terrorism.
articles.content: A court in military-ruled Myanmar sentenced detained US journalist Danny Fenster to 11 years in prison after finding him guilty on several charges including incitement for allegedly spreading false o… [+2593 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Brazil becomes first South American team to qualify for 2022 World Cup - The Star Online
articles.description: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -     Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.
articles.content:
SAO PAULO (Reuters) - Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.

articles.author: Richard Wood
articles.title: US taking 'big bet' on Australia and nuclear submarines - 9News
articles.description: The sharing of sensitive American nuclear submarine technology with Australia is a signal that Washington is prepared to back its allies, a top US official says.

articles.author: Michael Tarm, Scott Bauer And Tammy Webber
articles.title: Defense rests its case at murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The defense rested its case Thursday at the murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse, setting the stage for closing arguments Monday in the shootings that left Americans divided over whether he was a patriot taking a stand against lawlessness or a vigilante.
